name: Clay Generator Registry
description: A registry of known Clay generators available for installation

clay-java-entities.name: Java Entity Generator
clay-java-entities.description: Generates Java entity classes from Clay models
clay-java-entities.author: morkeleb

clay-typescript-interfaces.name: TypeScript Interface Generator
clay-typescript-interfaces.description: Generates TypeScript interfaces and types from Clay models
clay-typescript-interfaces.author: morkeleb

clay-react-components.name: React Component Generator
clay-react-components.description: Generates React components with forms and displays from Clay models
clay-react-components.author: morkeleb

clay-sql-schema.name: SQL Schema Generator
clay-sql-schema.description: Generates SQL DDL statements for database schemas from Clay models
clay-sql-schema.author: morkeleb

clay-api-routes.name: API Routes Generator
clay-api-routes.description: Generates REST API routes and controllers from Clay models
clay-api-routes.author: morkeleb
